specialization.description: The MMXF field is an XML field for which the XML is 'MMXF', which is a subset of XHTML2. Setting it as a String is onderstood in verious ways. E.g. input from the 'kupu' editor is understood and converted to MMXF.
'mmxfunp' fields can be used just like 'mmxf' fields, but it anticipates that the field previously was a simple String field (and on the front-end escape='p' was used).

If the field is empty, then getString returns a field based on 'indexrel' related objects to the current node. If e.g. the node related to the same parent but with a position one less, does have a filled 'index' field, it returns that value, but increased by one (so, if it is 'a' then 'b' is returned, if it is '1' then '2' is returned). This results into a situation in which you have fully automatic index numbers on your objects, if there are present in tree-structure by 'indexrel'.
